notes.text: sap.m.Dialog: Prevent null within area resize observer deregistration
Demo Kit: Icon explorer scroll fixed
sap.m.Label: Revert
sap.m.Dialog: Fix error caused by inaccessible DOM ref
CellSelector: Return correct row contexts when grouping
sap.m.ObjectStatus: add empty value description in the acc info
sap.m.MessageView: Title link is now truncated
We've now added the carousel behaviour, and increased the tap area for the indicators on the SlideTile control
sap.m.Carousel: Empty page message resizes correctly in vertical direction
sap.m.MessageStrip: Displaying multiple links is now enabled
sap.m.ObjectStatus: Event is fired correctly on pressing SPACE without scrolling the page
sap.m.NavContainer: Unstable test
sap.m.Token: extend touch area for horizon themes
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: navigate to correct month in islamic calendar
sap.m.Link: prevent default before press for mobile safari
sap.m.Label: Asteriks is visible when parent container has a set width
We've now removed sap-desktop attribute to provide consistent focus across all devices
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: add today announcement for the grid cell
sap.m.ObjectListItem: adding an accessibility test page
sap.m.Button: prevent press on right click
sap.m.IconTabBar: Content padding classes are applied to the header if additional class is present
sap.m.ObjectStatus: Icon on Firefox is not cut now
sap.m.TimePicker: align the placeholder reference with other inputs
sap.m.ObjectIdentifier: Accessible Improvement for ObjectIdentifier test page
sap.m.ObjectStatus: add group type "Data" to value property
We now ensure that UploadSet does not insert or removes any item if they are bound to a model
SinglePlanningCalendar: Change in the z-index of the header
sap.m.StepInput: The valueStateText is given priority.
sap.m.ObjectIdentifier & ObjectNumber: add group type "Data" to value property
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: fixed "select all" checkbox positioning
sap.m.Popover: Revert some of resize handle size changes
sap.m.MenuButton: buttons in split mode have separate tooltips
sap.m.ColorPalettePopover: synch selected color with inner palette
Integration cards: List 'info' is now correctly displayed
We ensure that the UploadSetwithTable plugin now uses currentContexts for file preview
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Proper positioning of a non-work period.
We now ensure that the content maintained within the GenericTile does not extended beyond the control
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: show busy indicator while rows loading
Demo Kit: Fixed the spacing between links
sap.m.Menu: properties string values are escaped when creating internal controls
sap.m.MessageBox: Added missing documentation
sap.m.QuickView: Title and description wrap correctly
sap.m.TimePicker: set default width
